name: Admiral Brickell
abilities:
Naval Tactics (Level 3)
Blast Chain (Level 7)
Mega Mine (Level 10)
target:
First, Last, Close, Strong,
All Mines locked to First.
inGameDesc: Command all your water-based Monkeys to decisive victory. Requires water to place.

towerBoosts.name: Naval Tactics
value: Level 3-4: All water-based Monkeys within range including herself get double attack speed
Level 5-7: Water-based Monkeys within range get +1 pierce and normal damage type as well
Level 8-18: Water-based Monkeys within range get Camo detection

levels.levelBody:
Description: Drops powerful sea mines that seek and destroy Bloons.
Effect: Starts with two attacks: sea mines, and a pistol. Pistol is a snipe attack that instantly hits the bloon with sharp damage type. Sea mines are regularly deployed into nearby water, and each mine quickly seeks onto bloons if within range of the mine. Sea mines last for a limited time.
Pistol deals 3 damage with a range of 50 and attacks every 0.8s.
Mines are dropped every 3.0 seconds in nearby water. They avoid being placed on other water towers unless it is the only available spot and never spawn on top of Brickell herself. Each mine lasts for 120 seconds or 2 rounds, whichever comes first.
The initial hit deals 1 damage to the affected bloon with normal damage type, then releases an explosion with 1 damage, 20 pierce and explosion damage type. Blast radius of 25.
Cooldown for the seeking of each sea mine is capped at a minimum of 0.4s per mine.

Description: Increased attack speed.
Effect: Pistol attack gets ~+14.29% attack speed (0.875x attack cooldown), now attacking every 0.7s. Mines get ~+7.143% attack speed (0.933x attack cooldown), now attacking every 2.8s.

Description: Naval Tactics: greatly increases attack speed of Brickell and nearby water-based Monkeys for a short time.
Effect: Unlocks Naval Tactics ability. When activated, all nearby water towers including Brickell gain 50% cooldown or 200% attack speed for the duration of the ability, 9 seconds. Cooldown of 50 seconds.

Description: More popping power for Sea Mines.
Effect: Pierce of each sea mine explosion increased from 20 to 28.

Description: Naval Tactics increases popping power and allows affected Monkeys to hit all Bloon types except Camo.
Effect: Naval Tactics also gives +1 pierce and normal damage type to nearby towers.

Description: Increases the damage of Sea Mines and Pistol attacks.
Effect: Pistol damage increased from 3 to 5. Sea Mines damage increased from 1 to 2 for both initial hit and explosion damage.

Description: Blast Chain: Sea mines fire off quicker for a short time. Brickell gains increased attack range and Camo Bloon detection.
Effect: Admiral Brickell gains camo detection. Does not gain Camo Prioritization. Also gains a new ability: Blast Chain. When activated, all sea mines have half attack cooldown and doubled projectile speed for 10 seconds. Cooldown of 45 seconds.

Description: Naval Tactics allows affected Monkeys to hit Camo Bloons. Water towers in radius gain extra pierce.
Effect: Naval Tactics allows affected Monkeys to detect Camo Bloons. Water towers near Brickell also receives +1 pierce at all times, which stacks with the pierce buff given by Naval Tactics.

Description: Sea Mines do extra damage.
Effect: Sea mines damage increased from 2 to 7.

Description: Mega Mine: deploys to any water area a devastating Mine that triggers on MOABs and stuns nearby Bloons. Mega Mines last 3 rounds.
Effect: Unlocks Mega Mine ability. When activated, deploys a Mega Mine onto any water location. Mega Mines have 4000 damage, 100 pierce, blast radius of 100, and a 5 second stun if the Bloon survives. Mega Mines have a 180 second or 4 round lifespan, whichever comes first. Mega mine only can be triggered by MOAB Class Bloons in its range. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

Description: Faster deploy speed and deploy rate for Sea Mines.
Effect: Mines get ~+11.99% attack speed (0.8929x attack cooldown) (every 2.5s)

Description: Pistol attack increased speed and damage, Sea Mines increased damage.
Effect: Pistol damage increased from 5 to 8, and pistol gains ~+75% attack speed (0.5714x attack cooldown), shooting every 0.4s. Sea Mines damage increased from 8 to 12.

Description: Mega Mine cooldown reduced.
Effect: Mega Mine cooldown decreased from 60s to 50s.

Description: Naval Tactics duration increased.
Effect: Naval Tactics duration increased from 9s to 12s.

Description: Enhanced Sea Mines have larger explosion, can damage Black Bloons and remove Camo property.
Effect: Sea mine blast radius increased from 20 to 30, damages all bloon types and strips camo. Pistol damage increased from 7 to 12.

Description: Attack and Sea Mine deploy range increased slightly.
Effect: Range increased from 58 to 62.

Description: Sea Mines do greatly increased damage. Pistol does more damage.
Effect: Sea Mines damage increased from 12 to 22, and pistol damage increased from 12 to 18.

Description: Mega Mine cooldown reduced even further.
Effect: Mega Mine cooldown decreased from 50s to 40s.

Description: Naval Tactics affects all water based towers everywhere.
Effect: Naval Tactics ability affects all water-based towers on screen.

Description: Mega Mine does massively increased damage and longer stun.
Effect: Mega Mine damage increased from 4,000 to 11,000, increase pierce from 100 to 150, blast radius from 100 to 120 and stuns survivors for 10s instead of 5s.
